pr_title: Optimize database operations in allergy intolerance resource

timeline.bodyText: Is this part of the optimization? If not, You should remove it
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

replies.bodyText: These are formatting changes applied by mvn clean install. I believe they should be part of the PR too.
replies.author: jecihjoy

replies.bodyText: I'd take these out of the PR. It's going to be changed in a different commit and will just cause a conflict later.
replies.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: What if  severityConceptUuids.size() == 3. This will return null which should not be the case. It should still return switch for the 3 UUIDs in the array and return there the concept
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

timeline.bodyText: You should be checking if the severityConceptUuids array is not empty
timeline.author: corneliouzbett

replies.bodyText:
globalPropertyService.getGlobalProperties(FhirConstants.GLOBAL_PROPERTY_MILD,
		    FhirConstants.GLOBAL_PROPERTY_MODERATE, FhirConstants.GLOBAL_PROPERTY_SEVERE,
		    FhirConstants.GLOBAL_PROPERTY_OTHER);
This method filters out null global properties. So there is a probability that size of results will not be 4 always
replies.author: corneliouzbett

timeline.bodyText: I'd still have this return a Map<String, String> rather than HashMap<String, String>

timeline.message: Optimize application reloads using spring dev tools

timeline.bodyText: We should first check if the severityConcept is null and abort if that's the case.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: I'd also add an exit condition upfront for if severity is null.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Could we add some tests that cover the handleServerity method, especially for the different severity levels?
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: I don't think we want this as a class variable. It should just be a local variable in the one function that uses it.
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: I'm not sure I understand why you've changed this method?
timeline.author: ibacher

timeline.bodyText: Instead of setting a class variable, just return the map from this function and use it as a local variable where needed. Storing state in DAO objects is a bad idea (what happens if the DAO needs to be called simultaneously for two different queries?)
timeline.author: ibacher
